amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, sought to deem a party in a class action suit as admitting any fact with respect to which a discovery order was issued when that party withholds or destroys material subject to the order.
amendment.purpose: An amendment which addresses parties that witheld or shred documents related to court-ordered discovery. Such parties would be deemed to have admitted to any fact relating to the discovery order.
